newsitem.title: USA: Rally's ends talks with Checkers.
newsitem.headline: Rally's ends talks with Checkers.

text.p: Rally's Hamburgers Inc said Monday it ended merger negotiations with Checkers Drive-In Restaurants Inc.

The company said financial obstacles, resulting from the inability to obtain prior approval from the Securities and Exchange Commission for favorable accounting treatment, was the primary factor in ending the talks.

Under the terms of a letter of intent signed March 25, all the issued and outstanding shares of Rally's capital stock was to be converted into and become Checkers common stock at a ratio of one share of Rally's common stock for three shares of Checkers common stock.
Rally's Hamburgers, along with its franchisees, operate 473 drive-thru restaurants primarily in the Midwestern United States.
Checkers Drive-In Restaurants, along with its franchisees, operate 478 drive- thru restaurants located primarily in the Southeastern United States.
